body.p:
Covington Ky August 13, '63
To His Excellency Jas F Robinson:
Governor of Kentucky --

Accompanying you will find the Petition of Wm Shmoddle to have a fine adjudged against him by B Eggleston J. P. K C of $50. cancelled or pardoned. I send the statements of J F Fisk Esqr (at the close of the Petition) who acted as County Attorney, also of the acting Magistrate and of the Mayor of the City, all Joining in the prayer for his pardon. I do not know that you will require anything further and request that you will send your answer to my address or to B Eggelston Esqr J. P. K. C. of this City. With sentiments of great esteem, belive me

Yours Respetfully
John P. Harrison
Post office Box 303

Hon. Jas F Robinson
Governor of Kentucky
